subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: {{clipping|zh}} of {{ltc-l|南膜|id=1,1}}, which is from {{der|zh|sa|नमस्||[[bow]]; [[obeisance]]; [[salutation]]}}. Compare {{zh-l|*南無}}.
